poster: Ε Ζ Γ Ε Α L
title: Transfer?
body:
So, I want to transfer my EUW account to NA, but it won't allow me.

Is this because it's the preseason or because Rito has technical issues?

replies.body:
There are still some issues going on with transfers, mainly issues on how our data centers communicate to each other.

We're still troubleshooting it, but I still don't have an ETA on when transfers will be back up. :x The best places to check on updates is on the [server status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/) or our [news page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/).

I wish I could provide a more definite answer and know it's been a huge player pain, but it's definitely a priority with the team and we're hoping to have transfers back up soon.

Because they ran onto some problems which apparently still arent fixed after month. According to an already deleted reddit post they delayed further till February. But at this point even that is not for sure.
